content:
### Intents:
       1. Repository access
ID: 145451-734-789456
Description: This intent refers  to the problems with accessing an online database, repository, drive, shared folder, shared file; issues with uploading and saving something to a shared drive (if it is clearly due to lack of access)
{
    "entities": [
        "GitLab, Gitolite, Bugzilla, Trello, Google Drive, (Google) Shared Drive, OneDrive, SharePoint, GitHub, SVN"
    ]
}

	2. Manage Distribution List
ID: 258451-789-789444
Description: This intent refers to the  request of adding/Removing people (either users or owners/admins) to/from group distribution list (DL), mailing list, listserv, shared mailbox, mail group, mail alias, Microsoft Office 365 group, etc. Request to create or delete DL, etc.

{
    "entities": {
        "dl_name": "name_of_distibution_list",
        "contact": "first.name_last.name",
        "email": "email_address"
    }
}


	3.  Camera Issues
ID: 145499-745-789122
Description: This intent refers to help needed with the configuration or setup of the laptop camera or user is having issues with their camera or webcam during meetings.
Entities: []

	4. Performance Inquiry
ID: 253651-765-78145
Description: This intent refers to any inquiries or concerns regarding the performance management system, PMD, SMART goals, goals, performance and development plans.
Entities: []

	5. Password reset
ID: 245651-005-71475
Description: This intent refers to a user's request to reset their forgotten or compromised password within a system, application or platform.
Entities: []

### Task:

Above is the list of intents and possible entities for the intent. Each intent has its unique ID and description. 
 
Given an user input, identify the intent that it best matches and extract all entities specific to the intent from the user input. If multiple entities present, fill all the slots.
 
Return your response in JSON format. If there are no matching intents, return the intent id as NONE. 
 
Use the following format for your response:
 
{
    "intent": "id",
    "entities": []
}
====

My account is locked due to the maximum pwd attempts. Please reset my password
